alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT STILLWATER...SOUTHEASTERN WHEATLAND...NORTHWESTERN CARBON...SOUTHWESTERN GOLDEN VALLEY...SWEET GRASS AND NORTH CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 12 miles southwest of Big Timber, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Big Timber, Absarokee, Springdale, Reed Point, Fishtail, Boyd, Roberts, Dean, Mc Leod, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Melville, Greycliff, Nye, Roscoe, and Luther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
